timeline.message: [NETBEANS-3985] : Removed pack200 from netbeans installer, because its not supported by jdk from version 14 onwards
[NETBEANS-3985] : Added comments and commented pack200 related code

timeline.bodyText: I guess the methods (and so their attributes in the build.xml) should stay here, for compatibility. They, of course, won't do anything.
timeline.author: jlahoda

replies.bodyText: Addressed code review comments and removed all the previously commented code.
replies.author: singh-akhilesh
